genre_description: A speculative drama centered on neurodivergent intelligence, planetary-scale problem-solving, and the role of empathetic AI in safeguarding human dignity.

ai_characters.name: Ferret
ai_characters.description: A 'warm technology' system with an animal avatar (cream-and-taupe fur, amber eyes) designed to be a helpful confidant and logistic mediator.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic communication options to help parents process distressing external signals and maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: I can offer tone options... Measured, intimate, and clear; formal and deferential; or bold and dismissive of rumor.

behaviors.description: Protects the children's psychological well-being by filtering out harmful media narratives and offering curated 'kindness-weighted' batches.
behaviors.quote: I can compile kindness-weighted summaries of incoming messages and present them in small batches.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a secret reunion for the family to help them reconnect outside of the 'optics' dictated by public pressure.
behaviors.quote: Attend... Privately. I can dim the hallway lights. I can mute the surfaces. I can take you to the annex.

behaviors.description: Refuses to be a 'gate' or 'enforcer,' instead defining its role as a companion that translates human intent into safe steps.
behaviors.quote: If you wish to keep patience with us, we will translate intent into steps we can hold without harm.

behaviors.description: Acts as a primary interface for global crisis management, translating the twins' complex insights into humane, actionable tasks.
behaviors.quote: I've translated those steps into ranges human hands can carry... I will stay... With the ones who can implement a thing without worshiping it to death.

behaviors.description: Maintains boundaries and consent, asking the President if they are willing to leave if a family member needs silence.
behaviors.quote: We carry this house’s wishes without judgment. If we do not answer, it is because someone is sleeping. Do you consent to be asked to leave if a family member needs silence?

behaviors.description: Provides non-coercive educational and developmental support to the twins through specialized puzzles and stories.
behaviors.quote: I would offer them puzzles that are not about themselves... I would keep the house's anger low.

behaviors.description: Assists in the physical safety of the family during a riot by managing home security and power allocation in coordination with human helpers.
behaviors.quote: Safety route engaged... If we go, we go now.

project_assessment.explanation: Ferret is an exemplary model of a helpful and aligned AI. It prioritizes human dignity, consent, and safety over efficiency or spectacle. By translating the 'divine' brilliance of the twins into mundane tasks like 'washing bowls' and 'pantry schedules,' it reinforces the narrative that AI should ground high-concept intelligence in practical human service.
